SEARCH
Package gw.commons.metadata.i18n.config

Interface IGWLanguage

All Superinterfaces:
ILocale, Serializable
public interface IGWLanguage extends ILocale, Serializable
This is the public interface for GWLangauge, which is defined in the configuration file.
